title: Special Edition: Robert Mueller Submits His Report
description: The Mueller report has been sent to the attorney general. Here’s a look at what this means and what comes next. Guest: Michael S. Schmidt, who has been covering the special counsel investigation for The New York Times. For more information on today’s episode, visit nytimes.com/thedaily.
author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
